messages.title: It’s time for change in Amber Valley.
messages.content: We need an MP that will fight for local people.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: End years of conservative neglect, deliver real change, invest more in nurses and doctors, and provide the care people need.
Increase NHS funding, real living wage of £10 an hour, increase in income tax for 95% of people, free school meals, reduced class sizes, bus passes for under 25s, secure a credible Brexit deal.
Investment in vocational education to prepare students for high quality jobs, investment in both teachers and facilities to offer a first-class education.

issues.brexitEurope: Secure a credible Brexit deal in 3 months and put it to the people for the final say
issues.economy: Real living wage of £10 an hour, increase in income tax for 95% of people
issues.education: Free school meals for all primary school children, reduced class sizes for all primary school children
issues.health: Labour for the NHS. End years of conservative neglect, deliver real change, invest more in nurses and doctors, and provide the care people need

quotes.text: This election is a once-in-a-generation chance to transform our country and take on the vested interests holding people back.
Labour will deliver the real change Britain needs, so that no one is held back and no community left behind.

images.caption: Dr Adam Thompson with supporters holding Labour placards
